sentence.Network_en: You can improve your chances of profit by sensible planning.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以通过合理计划来提高盈利的机会。

sentence.Network_en: He's been very unlucky that no chances have fallen to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很不走运，机会一次也没有落到他头上。

sentence.Network_en: Lights clipped onto life jackets improve the chances of rescue.
sentence.Network_cn: 别在救生衣上的灯提高了获救可能性。

don't take any chances .不要抱有侥幸心理。

entry.def: If there is a chance of something happening, it is possible that it will happen.

example.ex: Do you think they have a chance of beating Australia?...
example.tran: 你认为他们有可能击败澳大利亚吗？

example.ex: This partnership has a good chance of success...
example.tran: 这个组合获胜的希望很大。

entry.def: If you have a chance to do something, you have the opportunity to do it.

example.ex: The electoral council announced that all eligible people would get a chance to vote...
example.tran: 选举委员会宣布，所有有资格者都将获得投票的机会。

example.ex: Most refugee doctors never get the chance to practice medicine in British hospitals...
example.tran: 多数去避难的医生永远没有机会在英国医院行医。

entry.def: A chance meeting or event is one that is not planned or expected.
If you chance to do something or chance on something, you do it or find it although you had not planned or tried to.

example.ex: A man I chanced to meet proved to be a most unusual character...
example.tran: 我邂逅了一个人，后来发现他是个极为与众不同的家伙。

example.ex: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
example.tran: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

entry.def: If you chance something, you do it even though there is a risk that you may not succeed or that something bad may happen.

example.ex: Andy knew the risks. I cannot believe he would have chanced it...
example.tran: 安迪知道有风险，我不敢相信他竟然甘冒其险。

example.ex: He decided no assassin would chance a shot from amongst that crowd.
example.tran: 他认定，没有刺客会冒险混在人群里开枪。

entry.def: Something that happens by chance was not planned by anyone.

example.ex: He had met Mr Maude by chance.

entry.tran: (用以询问某事是否属实)会不会，可能
entry.def: You can use by any chance when you are asking questions in order to find out whether something that you think might be true is actually true.

example.ex: Are they by any chance related?

entry.def: If you say that someone stands a chance of achieving something, you mean that they are likely to achieve it. If you say that someone doesn't stand a chance of achieving something, you mean that they cannot possibly achieve it.

example.ex: Being very good at science subjects, I stood a good chance of gaining high grades...
example.tran: 我理科很棒，所以很有机会拿高分。

example.ex: Neither is seen as standing any chance of snatching the leadership from him.
example.tran: 两人都不被认为有任何可能从他手中夺得领导权。

entry.def: When you take a chance, you try to do something although there is a large risk of danger or failure.

example.ex: You take a chance on the weather if you holiday in the UK...
example.tran: 在英国度假，只有赌天气了。

example.ex: From then on, they were taking no chances...
example.tran: 从那时起，他们就不再冒险了。

auth_sentence.content: Chances are that you've seen it all before.
auth_sentence.res_content: Chances are that you've seen it all before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Chances are that you've seen it all before.

auth_sentence.content: What are the chances of an attack on Iran?
auth_sentence.res_content: What are the chances of an attack on Iran?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What are the chances of an attack on Iran?

auth_sentence.content: Chances like this don't come around very often.
auth_sentence.res_content: Chances like this don't come around very often.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Chances like this don't come around very often.

Sentence.sentence: Their chances of getting a good job.
So, if you were doing well, having an audience increases the chances that you will continue to do well
If you were doing badly, having an audience increases the chances that you will continue to do badly
To create chances for the poor.

If you are having these types of coffee regularly then they will increase the chances of you becoming overweight, which in turn increases your risk of developing cancer, as well as other diseases such as heart disease.
